title: stonehedge
author: stonehedge
content: Dear Bitcointalk Community,After nearly a decade working on other people's projects, I'm thrilled to announce Hemis, a new layer 1 blockchain platform set to launch in January 2024. Bitcointalk is where my blockchain career began so it only felt natural to announce our project here first.Community-Powered, Innovation-LedDecentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO): Hemis has a community-driven leadership model. Every decision and advancement within Hemis will be ratified by its most valuable stakeholders – our users. This ensures a platform that truly reflects the needs and aspirations of its community.Intuitive Game Creation Tools: Say goodbye to the complexities of coding and Solidity. Hemis provides user-friendly tools, making it easy for anyone to create their favorite games of chance, from card games to board games and dice games.Platform-Agnostic API: Our API, along with browser plugin wallets and dedicated iOS and Android apps, will ensure that your games are accessible to a global audience, regardless of the platform.Rewarding Game Development: Hemis is not just about playing games – it's about rewarding the creative and managerial efforts of game developers and Gamemaster node operators. Our platform makes it possible for your creativity and management skills to yield tangible rewards.Hemis Utility Token: The backbone of our ecosystem is the Hemis utility token. We're kicking off with a free airdrop this January – the primary way to acquire Hemis tokens. Additionally, token staking will play a crucial role in securely launching the chain. A mere <5% of the total utility supply will be airdropped in February 2024, with the remaining tokens being minted over the next ten years.Provably Fair Gaming: Fairness is paramount at Hemis. Our platform offers provably fair random number generation and secure transactions for both fungible and non-fungible tokens, all without the need for any coding or contract creation.As we approach the launch of Hemis, we invite developers, gamers, and blockchain enthusiasts to join our journey in reshaping the world of online gaming. Stay tuned for more details and updates by following us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/hemisblockchain/) and visiting https://hemis.tech.We will also post all of our major updates in this thread.Thank you for your interest and support.Best regards,Dan Ames & The Hemis Project Team

comments.author: stonehedge
comments.body: Quote from: 1pool.pw on November 29, 2023, 03:49:50 PMPow Network?Hi, I'll be sharing full launch details soon.We will be launching with a private PoW phase for a few hundred blocks before switching to PoS.  We will then operate our airdrop with the goal to make sure that no one entity controls more than 50% of staking. In short, we want to make sure that the community hold more tokens than the core team otherwise the DAO and blockchain will be centralised and relatively meaningless.

comments.author: Mrrr
comments.body: MAGIC! It's all working an hasn't broken (yet).For those too lazy to click the link, here's today's update on hemis.tech:QuoteWe’re delighted to announce that the Hemis blockchain is alive and well!    The genesis block was mined successfully    The premine executed according to specification and all tokens are accounted for.    The Proof of Work mining phase completed successully.    Block time is currently a little unstable but difficulty is adjusting and block time is stabilising according to the specification of 60 seconds.    The P2P network is healthy, with seed nodes located in diverse locations.    The block explorer is live https://explorer.hemis.tech/    The blockchain is currently secured by staking with the dev fund. Any tokens generated by staking before the community have received their tokens will be added to the airdrop fund.Token Transparency.    The airdrop token fund can be viewed at this address. https://explorer.hemis.tech/address/HU6sfgeo1UHKtpyJtLFn8d4T9AttLd1cAe    We estimate that the airdrop fund will increase by approximately 5,000 tokens per day as we add tokens from the private staking phase.    The early supporter/investor fund can be viewed at this address. https://explorer.hemis.tech/address/HNcgNsQqTmyVjaci5bfYkkKTL6FYetchmi    The early supporter/investor fund tokens will not be distributed to their respective owners until after the community airdrop is complete. The community will get their tokens first.A Short Delay.The original plan was to make the wallet open source this week. However during launch we identified six minor bugs that we would like to fix before release. We now expect to release the wallet and source code in week beginning 22 January 2024.Next StepsFor a reminder on the launch process, please see this article. We are currently at step 4.Airdrop Announcement & FOMO.Due to the short delay in releasing the wallet, we do not plan to announce the airdrop until week begining 22 January 2024. We wanted to reassure the community that we will give everybody plenty of notice and time to participate. When we announce the airdrop there will be at least one week notice before the airdrop actually opens. It is of crucial important that as many people as possible participate so we have no intention of leaving anybody behind. If you are in our Discord or follow us on Twitter, you will not miss out!A Proud MomentI would like to extend a heartfelt thank you to TheExiledMonk, Infernoman, and AKCryptoGuy for their impeccable execution of our blockchain launch. Achieving a safe and flawless launch is a complex feat, and their efforts made it a reality. Additionally, my gratitude goes out to the entire Hemis team and our project backers. Your support has been crucial to the success of this project. Despite being an unpaid endeavor, faced with challenges of a global pandemic and personal hardships, the journey has been incredibly fulfilling. Seeing the chain go live is a proud moment.Lets take this blank canvas and build something special together.

The airdrop will only start in February, right?Hi, the tokens you see in the rich list are the Airdrop fund, the founder fund and the y1 dev fund.We are currently using the dev fund to stake the chain, until the airdrop is complete. This is why there are lots of addresses with small balances.When the time for the Airdrop arrives, all of these tokens will be swept into 3 addresses and every token accounted for so that the community can see that coin supply is exactly as specified.

comments.author: stonehedge
comments.body: Here is a blog post outlining the full details of the airdrop and how to enter.https://hemis.tech/2024/01/the-hemis-airdrop/PLEASE NOTE THAT WE HAVE NOT ANNOUNCED A DATE FOR THE AIRDROP YETWe are not quite happy with the wallet yet, with further testing required. We will announce the airdrop opening date as soon as we are happy with the wallet.  We're sorry for the delay on this, but there are a handful of issues that we need to test extremely thoroughly.Please bare with us, attention to detail and thorough testing is key and for that reason we don't want to make the mistake of announcing and then missing another release date.
